item.title: Bitcoin surges past $100k for first time
item.description: Its record price is making headlines - but that's just one part of the cryptocurrency's tumultuous story.

item.title: Why voters are giving Africa's governing parties a bloody nose
item.description: Namibia's Swapo records its worst election performance - continuing a trend seen across Africa.

item.title: India's 'blockbuster' drugs to take on deadly superbugs
item.description: A number of promising new drugs from India show potential to fight antibiotic-resistant bacteria.

item.title: What a new photo reveals about the gunman in CEO Brian Thompson killing
item.description: Police are using facial recognition software to try to determine the identity of the gunman.

item.title: Barnier downfall threatens to set a pattern for what lies ahead
item.description: Paris correspondent Hugh Schofield asks if the next French prime minister will face the same fate as Michel Barnier.
